title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list is not saved and restored between sessions.
OB:
- The files appear in the File menu MRU list
- The files do not appear in the File menu MRU list
EB: - The files should appear in the File menu MRU list even after restarting the application
SR:
- Launch the application
- Open a few files
- Close the application
- Restart the application
- Observe the File menu MRU list to see if the previously opened files are still listed
